price: Aka ce *(masa), "Ka shiga Aljanna." Ya ce, "Dã dai a ce mutãnẽna sunã iya sani."
arabic: قِيلَ ٱدۡخُلِ ٱلۡجَنَّةَۖ قَالَ يَٰلَيۡتَ قَوۡمِي يَعۡلَمُونَ
footnotes: * An ce masa haka a bayan mutãne sun kashe shi sabõda ĩmãninsa. Wannan shi ne sakamakon mai wa'azi idan ya yi shahada a kan aikinsa na wa'azi.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: qīla ud'khuli al-janata qāla yālayta qawmī yaʿlamūna
